Package org.opencastproject.workflow.api

Class WorkflowDefinitionImpl

java.lang.Object
org.opencastproject.workflow.api.WorkflowDefinitionImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<WorkflowDefinition>, WorkflowDefinition
public class WorkflowDefinitionImpl extends Object implements WorkflowDefinition
A JAXB-annotated implementation of WorkflowDefinition

      public int getDisplayOrder()

    • containsTag

      public boolean containsTag(Collection<String> tags)
      Description copied from interface: WorkflowDefinition
      Returns true if the workflow definition contains at least one of the given tags. If there are no tags contained in the set, then the definition is considered to match as well.
      Specified by:
      containsTag in interface WorkflowDefinition
      Parameters:
      tags - the set of tag
      Returns:
      true if the element is tagged accordingly
      See Also:
      • WorkflowDefinition.containsTag(Collection)

    • valueOf

      public static WorkflowDefinitionImpl valueOf(String xmlString) throws Exception
      Since we are posting workflow definitions as one post parameter in a multi-parameter post, we can not rely on "automatic" JAXB deserialization. We therefore need to provide a static valueOf(String) method to transform an XML string into a WorkflowDefinition.
      Parameters:
      xmlString - The xml describing the workflow
      Returns:
      A WorkflowDefinitionImpl instance based on xmlString
      Throws:
      Exception - If there is a problem marshalling the WorkflowDefinitionImpl from XML.
